description:
Course fully up-to-date and new lectures added as of this month.

JOIN 1,000s OF AUTHORS, STORYTELLERS, AND INFORMATION PROVIDERS WHO ARE NOW GENERATING ROYALTIES AROUND THE CLOCK.

1. Would you like to attract passive income every month working part-time?

2. Do you aspire to make more, tens of thousands, on your way to becoming a top 100 bestselling self-published author?

3. Are you interested in publishing a great selling ebook or building a publishing empire?

If you answered "yes" to at least one of these questions, then this course is for you!

From month-to-month, self-publishers account for more than 25% of the top 100 bestselling books on Amazon. In other words, thousands of self-published authors are attracting thousands in royalties every month. Furthermore, drawing a six to seven-figure income is possible, just ask Barbara Freethy, James Altucher, and Hugh Howey. These three, among many others, have become million-dollar self-publishing success stories.

Ebook Publishing Profits is the complete self-publishing mastery course, and it tackles a wide arrange of topics to help you to succeed. We'll discuss: writing and manuscript development, pricing, pre and post-launch strategies, online platform development, and various proven strategies used by other top authors and me. This course is designed to take your ebook revenues and royalties to the next level.

As you navigate this course, you'll gain insights and learn the strategies I use to make thousands every month with minimal effort. Upon successful completion of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Understand the key drivers of success and how they relate to your desired income
  • Understand how the six and seven-figure authors make their riches
  • Write, develop, and position your manuscript for optimal sales
  • Build an effective online author platform to build your fan and subscriber base
  • Employ a sound launch strategy to become a real bestselling author
  • Capitalize on the entire Amazon author ecosystem with emphasis on KDP


Sign up and experience the most comprehensive self-publishing course found on the web.

Start Learning!

Enroll now and start making money with ebooks TODAY!
title: Ebook Publishing Success: Amazon Kindle Publishing Empire
instructors: Chad Tennant, Make Money Online - Home Business
